1.Title: PROJECTS WE SUPPORT
1.Subtitle: Preserving the Amazon
1.Description: This project reduces deforestation in the Peruvian Amazon by improving forest management and promoting sustainable nut harvesting. This will help protect critical rainforest habitat and endangered species, while supporting the livelihoods of indigenous communities.

2.Title: GREEN ENERGY
2.Subtitle: Wind Projects
2.Description: We are expanding our portfolio of green projects to include Wind Energy. All our projects are in areas of the world where they would not be feasible without the funding from Carbon Credits. We hope you will help back these critical projects, to drive the renewable change needed to stop climate change.

3.Title: GREEN ENERGY
3.Subtitle: Solar Projects
3.Description: Now that solar power is cheaper than fossil fuels, solar projects are emerging across the globe. Soon we will be offering opportunities to support these essential projects; powering a greener world and reducing your carbon footprint in the process.
